# Merge Short Projesi
## Sıralandırma [16,21,11,8,12,22]
```
> [16,21,11] - [8,12,22]

> [16,21]-[11] -- [8,12]-[22]

> [16,21]-[11] -- [8,12]-[22]

>[11,16,21]-[8,12,22]

>[8,11,12,16,21,22]

```

## Big-O gösterimi
O(6*(log(2)6))
